query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_recharges, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN paymentMethod = 'pix' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pix_recharges,
       SUM(CASE WHEN paymentMethod = 'card' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as card_recharges,
       SUM(CASE WHEN paymentMethod = 'crypto' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as crypto_recharges
FROM recharges;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total_recharges, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN paymentMethod = 'pix' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pix_recharges,
       SUM(CASE WHEN paymentMethod = 'card' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as card_recharges,
       SUM(CASE WHEN paymentMethod = 'crypto' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as crypto_recharges
FROM recharges;
